name: WeAreMillions Spring 2022 Hackathon
description: From March 1-21, artists, gamers, developers, activists, crypto and non-crypto people came together to explore the power of art, blockchain and games. They were creating a fair and ethical, private, censorship-free, permissionless and unstoppable Web3. A force that makes the world a better, more accessible, more connected, and more enjoyable place.
